publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the last day of August, and of Our Reign the eleventh year 1699.
Signed: Gilb. Elliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Adjourning the Parliament "from the said twelvth day of September next to come, to the eight day of November next thereafter."
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson
